about_the_game: The Hentai Nureta Fanbook gives you all the pictures of your favourite girls form HNP Power Girls. You do not need to assemble the puzzle and you can watch all pictures + some sketches. Great stuff for HNP fans.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains erotic pictures.
: Nudity or sexual content
: Not suitable for watching at work
: Not suitable for all ages
: All characters in the game are over 18 years old
